name: Get Snaked!
description:
Feeling a bit greedy? Up to the challenge of how much can you really eat and still get away with it, but showing it off? Get Snaked is just the game for you as you continue and continue to eat fruit that gets in your way but watch out for poisonous insects as that will take from your score and shorten you up. When you get a high score, you officially have earned some bragging rights to tell off to your friends! Go get 'em!

Controls: A to move left, D to move right, S to move down and W to move up. 

That's all there is too it for now :3

Notes; there is a bug whenever played on mobile devices such as the iPhone that sound is not present. The PC version via web browser is uneffectec.
